department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Signals and Systems
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 10-11:30, and weekly one hour Matlab section and one hour problem section to be arranged.
course.description: Time and frequency domain representations and analysis of signals and systems. Convolution and linear input-output systems in continuous and discrete time. Fourier transforms and Fourier series for continuous- and discrete-time signals. Laplace and Z transforms. Analog and digital filtering. Modulation. Sampling. FFT. Applications in circuit analysis, communication, control, and computing.
